objective.text: Be the first player to connect 4 of the same colored discs in a row (either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally).

how-to-play.title: HOW TO PLAY
how-to-play.how-1: A random Player is chosen to make the first move.
how-to-play.how-2: Players must alternate turns, and only one disc can be dropped in each turn.
how-to-play.how-3: The game ends when there is a 4-in-a-row or a stalemate.
